name: Spec Ops
description:
## Spec Ops (working title)

In Spec Ops, you are a member of the highly regarded, special operations division "GHOST" which is part of the dominion's military. You step into the role of GHOST initiate "Falcon". His speciality is infiltration. His missions usually evolve arround the collection if highly sensible intelligence.

"Spec Ops" will contain a full campaign, which tells the story of "Falcon". The gameplay is based upon the the mission objectives to gather intel or objects in enemy territory while minimizing casualties and not getting cought.

To reach the mission objectives, it is crucial to make best use of Falcons special abilities and evade any direct firefights with enemies, since he won't be able to sustain a lot of damage. During the progress of the campaign, Falcon will gain experience and unlock new abilities.

The mod is in early Alpha stage. Screenshots will be released soon.
